name: imageDrawPoint
description: Draws a point at the specified (x,y) coordinate.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: x
params.description: The x coordinate of the point.

params.name: y
params.description: The y coordinate of the point.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to draw a large square in the middle of an image.
examples.code:
<!--- Use the imageNew function to create a 200x200-pixel image. ---> 
 <cfset myImage=imageNew("",200,200)> 
 <!---Set the drawing color to orange. ---> 
 <cfset imageSetDrawingColor(myImage,"orange")> 
 <!--- Turn on antialiasing to improve image quality. ---> 
 <cfset imageSetAntialiasing(myImage,"on")> 
 <!--- Set the drawing area to 10 pixels. ---> 
 <cfset attr = structNew()>  
 <cfset attr.width = 10> 
 <cfset imageSetDrawingStroke(myImage,attr)> 
 <!--- Draw the point at (100,100). ---> 
 <cfset imageDrawPoint(myImage,100,100)> 
 <!--- Display the image in a browser. ---> 
 <cfimage source="#myImage#" action="writeToBrowser">
